summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Forty-first Street and East Forty-second Street, each from Tenth Avenue Northeast to Eleventh Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5468 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
